participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and resilient, Margaret approaches life with a positive attitude, always valuing family and creativity.
participant_1.background: i had cancer but its gone now. i can sew my own clothes. i've amazing children and grandchildren. i do not have a smartphone.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Fun-loving and adventurous, Jake enjoys exploring new hobbies and connecting with others through gaming and events.
participant_2.background: i like donuts. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events. i play a lot of call of duty. i drive a ford pinto. my favorite band is the insane clown posse.
